ygData.subject: Re: Charismatic Carillion
ygData.msgSnippet: Did you put at least one pratice point into your wind skill?  If you did, you might have to practice your wind skill up using your lv 16 song.  Since the
ygData.messageBody:
Did you put at least one pratice point into your wind skill? If you did,
you might have to practice your wind skill up using your lv 16 song. Since
the charisma song is not continuous.. it is impossible to raise your wind
skill with it. Trust me, you will want your wind skill to be capped when
you hit 19.
>
>I have a question on this song. I am a level 17 bard, and just recently
>acquired this song. I equipped my flute, and tried to play it. I got the
>following message: Learn to sing it before you play it. I proceeded to
>try and sing it, and could never get it going. Nothing but one missed note
>after the other. Is this common? Am I doing something wrong? Also, do I
>need a mouthpiece for my flute? I bought the flute from the Bard's Guild,
>and eqipped it as usual before I tried the song. Any help at all would be
>greatly appreciated. Thanks.
>
>Kirree
>Xegony Server
